[Home](https://www.sweenytx.gov/)
[Government](https://www.sweenytx.gov/city_government/index.php)
[Elections/ Eleccion](https://www.sweenytx.gov/city_government/elections.php)

Reporting requirements and other regulations are set out in Title 15 of the Texas Election Code (Ch. 251-259) and the rules adopted by the Texas Ethics Commission. Officeholders and candidates are subject to regulation under Title 15. State law requires them to file campaign finance reports (Form C/OH) with the City Secretary's Office. Reporting requirements end when a candidate has filed a final report with the City Secretary.
2025 Campaign Finance Reports-
Reports are listed according to filing date and time.
Reese C. Cook- modified reporting declared 01/29/2025 (CTA)
Dusty Hopkins- modified reporting declared 02/13/2025 (CTA)
Shellie S. Irwin- modified reporting declared 02/13/2025-(CTA)
Sandra Blaine-- modified reporting declared 02/14/2025-(CTA)
